00035 public class Solution implements Comparable<Solution> 
00036 {
00037 
00041         private static int nInstances = 0; 
00042         
00046         private int id;
00047         
00051         private float costs;
00052         
00056         private ArrayList<Route> routes;
00057         
00061         private double time; 
00062 
00063         
00067     public Solution() 
00068     {
00069         nInstances++;
00070         id = nInstances;
00071         costs = 0;
00072         routes = new ArrayList<Route>();
00073         time = 0;
00074     }
00075 
00081     public void addRoute(Route aRoute) 
00082     {
00083         routes.add(aRoute);
00084     }
00085 
00091     public void addCosts(Route aRoute) 
00092     {
00093         costs += aRoute.getCosts();
00094     }
00095 
00101     public void substractCosts(Route aRoute) 
00102     {
00103         costs -= aRoute.getCosts();
00104     }

00113         costs = c;

00151     public float getDemand() 
00152     {
00153         float demand = 0;
00154         for (Route aRoute : this.routes) 
00155         {
00156             demand = demand + aRoute.getDemand();
00157         }
00158 
00159         return demand;
00160     }
00161 
00167     public ArrayList<Node> getNodes() 
00168     {
00169         ArrayList<Node> nodes = new ArrayList<Node>();
00170         ArrayList<Node> candidates = new ArrayList<Node>();
00171 
00172         // In any list of nodes, the first one is the depot
00173         for (int i = 0; i < routes.size(); i++) 
00174         {
00175             Route iRoute = routes.get(i);
00176             candidates = iRoute.getNodes();
00177             for (int j = 0; j < candidates.size(); j++) 
00178             {
00179                 Node jCandidate = candidates.get(j);
00180                 if (nodes.contains(jCandidate) == false) 
00181                 {
00182                     if (jCandidate.getId() == 0) // the depot must be the first
00183                     {
00184                         nodes.add(0, jCandidate);
00185                     } else {
00186                         nodes.add(jCandidate);
00187                     }
00188                 }
00189             }
00190         }
00191 
00192         return nodes;
00193     }
00194 
00198     public String toString() 
00199     {
00200         Route aRoute; // auxiliary Route variable
00201         String s = "";
00202         s = s.concat("\r\n");
00203         s = s.concat("Sol ID : " + this.getId() + "\r\n");
00204         s = s.concat("Sol costs: " + getCosts()
00205                 + "\r\n");
00206         s = s.concat("# of routes in sol: " + routes.size());
00207         s = s.concat("\r\n\r\n\r\n");
00208         s = s.concat("List of routes (cost and nodes): \r\n\r\n");
00209         for (int i = 1; i <= routes.size(); i++) {
00210             aRoute = routes.get(i - 1);
00211             s = s.concat("Route " + i + " || ");
00212             s = s.concat("Costs = " + (double) aRoute.getCosts());
00213             s = s.concat("\r\n");
00214         }
00215         s = s.concat("\r\n");
00216         for (int i = 1; i <= routes.size(); i++) {
00217             aRoute = routes.get(i - 1);
00218             for (Edge e : aRoute.getEdges()) {
00219                 s = s.concat("\r\n" + e.getOrigin().getId() + "->" + e.getEnd().getId() );
00220                 /*if (e.getOrigin().getId() == 0 && i == 1) {
00221                     s = s.concat("0" + "\r\n" + e.getEnd().getId());
00222                 } else {
00223                     s = s.concat("\r\n" + e.getEnd().getId());
00224                 }*/
00225             }
00226         }
00227         s = s.concat("\r\n\r\n");
00228         return s;
00229     }

00240     public int compareTo(Solution otherSol) 
00241     {
00242         Solution other = otherSol;
00243         float e1 = this.getCosts();
00244         float e2 = other.getCosts();
00245         if (e1 < e2) {
00246             return -1;
00247         } else if (e1 > e2) {
00248             return 1;
00249         }
00250         return 0;
00251     }
